li.label: squamous incantation
li.description: An indescribably hideous gibbering! I'd even describe it as squamous, but I don't even know what that is! An unutterable word!

li.label: accursed incantation
li.description: A litany of dark morbidities expressed in crime, perversion, and insanity.

li.label: blasphemous incantation
li.description: A promise of hidden and fathomless worlds of strange life which pulsate in the gulfs beyond the stars and press hideously upon our own globe in unholy dimensions which only the dead and the moonstruck can glimpse.

li.label: loathsome incantation
li.description: We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.
